oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Datenbank über Pflanzenstärkungsmittel im Internet
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Marx, Peggy
Kühne, Stefan
Jahn, Marga
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
"Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A database on plant strengthening products was established on www.bba.de. The database contains information about all plant strengthening products listed in Ger-many, in particular information about the effects in various crops, and related uses of application are provided. It informs on whether product composition complies with the guidelines of organic farming. The user has several options to browse the database: by name of plant strengthening product, individual crop (e. g. fruits or ornamental plants), harmful organism or branch of production (e. g. fruit production). The data-base is useful for farmers as well as for scientists, extension services and also con-sumers. It opens quick access to relevant information and allows to easily keeping it up to date.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Marx, Peggy; Kühne, Stefan and Jahn, Marga (2007) Datenbank über Pflanzenstärkungsmittel im Internet. [Internet database on plant strengthening products.] Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
